message: Hi Bob, I have a product that I think would be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you for $18000.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $15000 for it. Let me know if this is within your range.

Bob, I appreciate your offer and understand your budget constraints.  While $15000 is tempting, I'm hoping to get a bit closer to my initial asking price.  Would you consider $16500?  This would still be a great deal for you, and it would allow me to make a fair profit.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I'm willing to go up to $16000 for the product. This is the highest I can afford without exceeding my budget. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
